queryMap.query: SELECT CD RACER_PERIO_NO FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD = 'D10000' ORDER BY CD DESC

SELECT RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,NM_KOR ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD ='D10031' AND CD = TH_STAT) TH_STAT_NM FROM TBDN_CAND_IDENT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND NM_KOR LIKE NVL ('%' || ? || '%', NM_KOR) AND NVL(DEL_YN,'N') = 'N' ORDER BY CAND_NO ASC

SELECT RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,NM_KOR ,NM_CHN ,NM_ENG ,BIRTH ,SEX ,PHONE1 ,PHONE2 ,PHONE3 ,CELLPHONE1 ,CELLPHONE2 ,CELLPHONE3 ,EMAIL ,FMLY_HEAD_NM_KOR ,FMLY_HEAD_RELN ,TH_STAT ,B.CD_NM AS TH_STAT_NM ,POST_NO ,ADDR1 ,ADDR2 ,PERMNT_POST_NO ,PERMNT1 ,PERMNT2 ,MRRG_YN ,MTARY_GBN ,C.CD_NM AS MTARY_GBN_NM ,ARMY_TPE ,D.CD_NM AS ARMY_TPE_NM ,BRNCH ,E.CD_NM AS BRNCH_NM ,MLT_CLS ,F.CD_NM AS MLT_CLS_NM ,ARMY_NO ,UNFED_RSN ,ENTR_ARMY_DD ,LEV_ARMY_DD ,SVCE_TERM ,HGHT ,WGHT ,SIGHT_LEFT ,SIGHT_RIGHT ,COLOR_BLIND ,G.CD_NM AS COLOR_BLIND_NM ,BLOD_TPE ,H.CD_NM AS BLOD_TPE_NM ,HEALTH_STAT ,I.CD_NM AS HEALTH_STAT_NM ,SMOKE_YN ,J.CD_NM AS SMOKE_YN_NM ,DRINK ,K.CD_NM AS DRINK_NM ,RELGN ,L.CD_NM AS RELGN_NM ,HOBY ,SPA_ABTY ,PRPT_MOVA ,PRPT_REAL ,HOUSE ,M.CD_NM AS HOUSE_NM ,SDE_JOB_NM ,SDE_JOB_MM_IM ,PROP_TOT_AMT ,GROUP_NM ,DUTY ,ENT_DT ,LEV_DT ,PTO_FILE_VIEW_NM ,PTO_FILE_REAL_NM ,A.DEL_YN FROM TBDN_CAND_IDENT A, (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10014') B , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10015') C , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10016') D , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10065') E , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10066') F , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10067') G , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10071') H , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10009') I , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10068') J , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10069') K , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10011') L , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10070') M WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND A.TH_STAT = B.CD(+) AND A.MTARY_GBN = C.CD(+) AND A.ARMY_TPE = D.CD(+) AND A.BRNCH = E.CD(+) AND A.MLT_CLS = F.CD(+) AND A.COLOR_BLIND = G.CD(+) AND A.BLOD_TPE = H.CD(+) AND A.HEALTH_STAT = I.CD(+) AND A.SMOKE_YN = J.CD(+) AND A.DRINK = K.CD(+) AND A.RELGN = L.CD(+) AND A.HOUSE = M.CD(+)

SELECT '' AS CHK ,RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,FMLY_RELN ,B.CD_NM AS FMLY_RELN_NM ,NM_KOR ,FC_DEC(RES_NO) RES_NO ,LAST_SCHL_CARR ,C.CD_NM AS LAST_SCHL_CARR_NM ,JOB_NM FROM TBDN_CAND_FMLY A , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10035') B , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10013') C WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND A.FMLY_RELN = B.CD(+) AND A.LAST_SCHL_CARR = C.CD(+)

SELECT '' AS CHK ,RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,LAST_SCHL_CARR ,B.CD_NM AS LAST_SCHL_CARR_NM ,LAST_SCHL_NM ,MJR ,MTRIC_SCHL_YY ,GRDU_SCHL_YY ,GRDU_GBN ,C.CD_NM AS GRDU_GBN_NM FROM TBDN_CAND_SCHL_CARR A , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10013') B , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10014') C WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND A.LAST_SCHL_CARR = B.CD(+) AND A.GRDU_GBN = C.CD(+)
SELECT '' AS CHK ,RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,TOUR_DT ,TOUR_NM ,ATHL_ITEM ,TOUR_RANK FROM TBDN_CAND_CARR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ORDER BY TOUR_DT DESC

SELECT '' AS CHK ,RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,NM_KOR ,RELN_GBN ,B.CD_NM AS RELN_GBN_NM ,RELN_DETL ,ADDR ,TEL ,A.RMK FROM TBDN_CAND_RELN A , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10072') B WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND A.RELN_GBN = B.CD(+) ORDER BY SEQ ASC
SELECT '' AS CHK ,RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,INVW_DT ,INVW_CNTNT ,INVW_MAN FROM TBDN_CAND_INVW_CNTNT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ORDER BY SEQ DESC

SELECT '' AS CHK ,RWNPT_ITEM_CD||RWNPT_DETL_ITEM_CD AS DUM_CD ,RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,RWNPT_GBN ,B.CD_NM AS RWNPT_GBN_NM ,RWNPT_DT ,RWNPT_ITEM_CD ,C.CD_NM AS RWNPT_ITEM_CD_NM ,RWNPT_DETL_ITEM_CD ,D.PRIZ_PENAL_NM AS RWNPT_DETL_ITEM_CD_NM ,DISC_CNTNT ,PRZ_SCR ,PENAL_SCR ,MANAGE_CNTNT FROM TBDN_CAND_RWNPT A , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10018') B ,(SELECT ITEM_CD AS CD,ITEM_NM AS CD_NM FROM TBDN_ITEM_CD) C ,(SELECT PRIZ_PENAL_CD,ITEM_CD,PRIZ_PENAL_NM FROM TBDN_PRIZ_PENAL_CD) D WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND A.RWNPT_GBN = B.CD(+) AND A.RWNPT_ITEM_CD = C.CD(+) AND A.RWNPT_ITEM_CD = D.ITEM_CD(+) AND A.RWNPT_DETL_ITEM_CD = D.PRIZ_PENAL_CD(+)
SELECT ITEM_CD AS CD ,ITEM_NM AS CD_NM FROM TBDN_ITEM_CD ORDER BY ITEM_NM ASC
SELECT ITEM_CD||PRIZ_PENAL_CD AS PRIZ_PENAL_CD, ITEM_CD, PRIZ_PENAL_NM, PENAL_SCR, ADD_SCR FROM TBDN_PRIZ_PENAL_CD ORDER BY PRIZ_PENAL_NM ASC
SELECT '' AS CHK ,ADD_SCR ,PENAL_SCR FROM TBDN_PRIZ_PENAL_CD WHERE ITEM_CD = ? AND PRIZ_PENAL_CD = ?

SELECT '' AS CHK ,RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,PRZ_DT ,PRZ_TYPE ,B.CD_NM AS PRZ_TYPE_NM ,A.RMK FROM TBDN_CAND_PRZ A , (SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10073') B WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND A.PRZ_TYPE = B.CD(+)

SELECT '' AS CHK ,RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,GBN ,B.CD_NM AS GBN_NM ,GEN_DT ,A.RMK FROM TBDN_TEMP_ABS A ,(SELECT * FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD='D10074') B WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND A.GBN = B.CD(+)

SELECT MAX(B.RMK)||LPAD(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(A.CAND_NO),5,8),0)+1,4,'0') AS SEQ FROM TBDN_CAND_IDENT A, TBDM_SPEC_CD B WHERE Trim(B.CD) = ? AND Trim(B.GRP_CD) = 'D10000' AND Trim(B.CD) = A.RACER_PERIO_NO(+)
SELECT '' AS CHK ,RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,CERT_NM ,CERT_NO ,REG_DT ,CERT_GRD FROM TBDN_CAND_CERT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ?
SELECT '' AS CHK ,RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,FILE_SEQ ,FILE_TITLE ,FILE_NAME ,FILE_URL ,FILE_SIZE FROM TBDN_CAND_IDENT_FILE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ?
SELECT '' AS CHK ,RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,STR_DT ,END_DT ,CARR_TERM ,OFFC_NM ,FLOC ,CHA_FLD ,LEAVE_RSN FROM TBDN_CAND_JOB_CARR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_CAND_IDENT ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,NM_KOR ,NM_CHN ,NM_ENG ,BIRTH ,SEX ,PHONE1 ,PHONE2 ,PHONE3 ,CELLPHONE1 ,CELLPHONE2 ,CELLPHONE3 ,EMAIL ,FMLY_HEAD_NM_KOR ,FMLY_HEAD_RELN ,TH_STAT ,POST_NO ,ADDR1 ,ADDR2 ,PERMNT_POST_NO ,PERMNT1 ,PERMNT2 ,MRRG_YN ,MTARY_GBN ,ARMY_TPE ,BRNCH ,MLT_CLS ,ARMY_NO ,UNFED_RSN ,ENTR_ARMY_DD ,LEV_ARMY_DD ,SVCE_TERM ,HGHT ,WGHT ,SIGHT_LEFT ,SIGHT_RIGHT ,COLOR_BLIND ,BLOD_TPE ,HEALTH_STAT ,SMOKE_YN ,DRINK ,RELGN ,HOBY ,SPA_ABTY ,PRPT_MOVA ,PRPT_REAL ,HOUSE ,SDE_JOB_NM ,SDE_JOB_MM_IM ,PROP_TOT_AMT ,GROUP_NM ,DUTY ,ENT_DT ,LEV_DT ,PTO_FILE_VIEW_NM ,PTO_FILE_REAL_NM ,DEL_YN ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM ) VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,'N' ,? ,SYSDATE )

UPDATE TBDN_CAND_IDENT SET NM_KOR = ? ,NM_CHN = ? ,NM_ENG = ? ,BIRTH = ? ,SEX = ? ,PHONE1 = ? ,PHONE2 = ? ,PHONE3 = ? ,CELLPHONE1 = ? ,CELLPHONE2 = ? ,CELLPHONE3 = ? ,EMAIL = ? ,FMLY_HEAD_NM_KOR = ? ,FMLY_HEAD_RELN = ? ,TH_STAT = ? ,POST_NO = ? ,ADDR1 = ? ,ADDR2 = ? ,PERMNT_POST_NO = ? ,PERMNT1 = ? ,PERMNT2 = ? ,MRRG_YN = ? ,MTARY_GBN = ? ,ARMY_TPE = ? ,BRNCH = ? ,MLT_CLS = ? ,ARMY_NO = ? ,UNFED_RSN = ? ,ENTR_ARMY_DD = ? ,LEV_ARMY_DD = ? ,SVCE_TERM = ? ,HGHT = ? ,WGHT = ? ,SIGHT_LEFT = ? ,SIGHT_RIGHT = ? ,COLOR_BLIND = ? ,BLOD_TPE = ? ,HEALTH_STAT = ? ,SMOKE_YN = ? ,DRINK = ? ,RELGN = ? ,HOBY = ? ,SPA_ABTY = ? ,PRPT_MOVA = ? ,PRPT_REAL = ? ,HOUSE = ? ,SDE_JOB_NM = ? ,SDE_JOB_MM_IM = ? ,PROP_TOT_AMT = ? ,GROUP_NM = ? ,DUTY = ? ,ENT_DT = ? ,LEV_DT = ? ,PTO_FILE_VIEW_NM = ? ,PTO_FILE_REAL_NM = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE ,DEL_YN = ? WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ?
UPDATE TBDN_CAND_IDENT SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_CAND_FMLY ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,FMLY_RELN ,NM_KOR ,RES_NO ,LAST_SCHL_CARR ,JOB_NM ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDN_CAND_FMLY ) ,? ,FC_ENC(?) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_CAND_FMLY SET FMLY_RELN = ? ,NM_KOR = ? ,RES_NO = FC_ENC(?) ,LAST_SCHL_CARR = ? ,JOB_NM = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_CAND_FMLY WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_CAND_SCHL_CARR ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,LAST_SCHL_CARR ,LAST_SCHL_NM ,MJR ,MTRIC_SCHL_YY ,GRDU_SCHL_YY ,GRDU_GBN ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDN_CAND_SCHL_CARR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )

UPDATE TBDN_CAND_SCHL_CARR SET LAST_SCHL_CARR = ? ,LAST_SCHL_NM = ? ,MJR = ? ,MTRIC_SCHL_YY = ? ,GRDU_SCHL_YY = ? ,GRDU_GBN = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_CAND_SCHL_CARR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_CAND_CARR ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,TOUR_DT ,TOUR_NM ,ATHL_ITEM ,TOUR_RANK ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM ) VALUES( ? ,? , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDN_CAND_CARR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_CAND_CARR SET TOUR_DT = ? ,TOUR_NM = ? ,ATHL_ITEM = ? ,TOUR_RANK = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_CAND_CARR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_CAND_RELN ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,NM_KOR ,RELN_GBN ,RELN_DETL ,ADDR ,TEL ,RMK ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM ) VALUES ( ? ,? , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDN_CAND_RELN WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_CAND_RELN SET NM_KOR = ? ,RELN_GBN = ? ,RELN_DETL = ? ,ADDR = ? ,TEL = ? ,RMK = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_CAND_RELN WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_CAND_INVW_CNTNT ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,INVW_DT ,INVW_CNTNT ,INVW_MAN ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM ) VALUES ( ? ,? , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDN_CAND_INVW_CNTNT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_CAND_INVW_CNTNT SET INVW_DT = ? ,INVW_CNTNT = ? ,INVW_MAN = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_CAND_INVW_CNTNT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_CAND_RWNPT( RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,RWNPT_GBN ,RWNPT_DT ,RWNPT_ITEM_CD ,RWNPT_DETL_ITEM_CD ,DISC_CNTNT ,PRZ_SCR ,PENAL_SCR ,MANAGE_CNTNT ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM ) VALUES ( ? ,? , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDN_CAND_RWNPT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )

UPDATE TBDN_CAND_RWNPT SET RWNPT_GBN = ? ,RWNPT_DT = ? ,RWNPT_ITEM_CD = ? ,RWNPT_DETL_ITEM_CD = ? ,DISC_CNTNT = ? ,PRZ_SCR = ? ,PENAL_SCR = ? ,MANAGE_CNTNT = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_CAND_RWNPT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_CAND_PRZ ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,PRZ_DT ,PRZ_TYPE ,RMK ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDN_CAND_PRZ WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_CAND_PRZ SET PRZ_DT = ? ,PRZ_TYPE = ? ,RMK = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_CAND_PRZ WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_TEMP_ABS ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,GBN ,GEN_DT ,RMK ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDN_TEMP_ABS WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_TEMP_ABS SET GBN = ? ,GEN_DT = ? ,RMK = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_TEMP_ABS WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_CAND_CERT ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,CERT_NM ,CERT_NO ,REG_DT ,CERT_GRD ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM ) VALUES ( ? ,? ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDN_CAND_CERT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_CAND_CERT SET CERT_NM = ? ,CERT_NO = ? ,REG_DT = ? ,CERT_GRD = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_CAND_CERT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_CAND_JOB_CARR ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,SEQ ,STR_DT ,END_DT ,CARR_TERM ,OFFC_NM ,FLOC ,CHA_FLD ,LEAVE_RSN ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM ) VALUES ( ? ,? ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM TBDN_CAND_JOB_CARR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )

UPDATE TBDN_CAND_JOB_CARR SET STR_DT = ? ,END_DT = ? ,CARR_TERM = ? ,OFFC_NM = ? ,FLOC = ? ,CHA_FLD = ? ,LEAVE_RSN = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_CAND_JOB_CARR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_CAND_IDENT_FILE ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,CAND_NO ,FILE_SEQ ,FILE_TITLE ,FILE_NAME ,FILE_URL ,FILE_SIZE ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM ) VALUES ( ? ,? ,(SELECT NVL(MAX(FILE_SEQ),0) + 1 FROM TBDN_CAND_IDENT_FILE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? ) ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_CAND_IDENT_FILE SET FILE_TITLE = ? ,FILE_NAME = ? ,FILE_URL = ? ,FILE_SIZE = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND FILE_SEQ = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_CAND_IDENT_FILE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND CAND_NO = ? AND FILE_SEQ = ?
